after_quest: ^Snowy: Hey buddy! Good of you to come all this way to visit me.

c-0: ^ You: I want to learn more about Ochano and how to defeat him.
^Snowy: Well that is quite the question!
c-1: ^ You: Snowy... will I have to slide across all this ice to see you again?
^Snowy: Of course not! You can use my ladder if you want to visit me again.
^Snowy: It goes under all of the ice, so it's much faster than sliding.
